title: techer1
author: techer1
created_time: April 01, 2023, 04:32:38 PMLast edit: April 01, 2023, 05:40:51 PM by techer1
content: I have a s19j pro that has a bad controller board and I have tried to reflash via sd card for hours on end and it won't work.Is there it chance this board is permanely bricked or is there something else that can be done to repair it.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: What firmware have you currently tested? If it's a stock firmware would you mind trying Braiins OS?I heard that they developing firmware that supports beaglebone except for the Armlogic board you can read more here Bitcoin Mining Control Board Variations ExplainedIf it doesn't work you don't have another choice but to replace it with the universal one where you can able to flash it with mod/custom firmware like BraiinsOS.

comments.author: techer1
comments.body: I think its a 2.3 BB Board. I will hunt around for the Brains OS and see if I can get it working with that.Thanks for your help!
